Title: Evaru
Overview: When a high-ranking police officer is killed by his alleged rape victim, Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with investigating what seems like an open-and-shut case. However, as he delves deeper, Vikram finds the case spiralling into a dark tale filled with unexpected surprises.

Title: Saaho
Overview: A battle for power ensues as warring gangters thrive to gain possession of a "black box" that can make them richer than they already are, and an undercover cop intervenes with the help of his sharp intellect and an instinct to kill.

Title: Rakshasudu
Overview: Arun, a newly recruited sub-inspector, sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets young girls and murders them. After a series of murders, Arun confirms that it's being done by a psychopath with an anti-social disorder. The killer continues his spree, but Arun is no mood to stop his pursuit.

Title: Maharshi
Overview: Rishi Kumar is a billionaire and the CEO of Origins, someone who has always strived for the success he now owns. His friend Ravi needs help, how will he come through?

Title: Vinaya Vidheya Rama
Overview: Ram is one among the five orphaned boys in Visakhapatnam, adopted by a doctor who ensures them a roof to live under, with dignity. Ram goes to any extent to protect his family and he's a handful for the baddie to handle in a time of crisis. How does Ram protect his family when they need him the most?

Title: Oh! Baby
Overview: A 70-year-old woman transforms into her 24-year-old self after she's photographed at a studio, changing her life and those of the people around her forever.

Title: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy
Overview: Gwalior Fort, during the Indian Rebellion of 1857. In a moment of despair, Lakshmibai, Rani of Jhansi, encourages her men by telling them the heroic story of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, a brave Telugu chieftain who took up arms in 1846 to protest against the numerous arbitrariness and crimes perpetrated by the leaders and military forces of the East India Company.

Title: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
Overview: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is a brilliant, underrated detective from Nellore who runs an agency called FBI which sees no business. He gets more than what he asked for when a case happens to fall right into his lap out of nowhere.

Title: Dear Comrade
Overview: A hot-blooded student union leader falls for a state-level cricketer but his anger management issues and violent streak threatens to derail their love story .

Title: Jersey
Overview: After his career fails to take off, a gifted cricketer in his mid-thirties decides that he’s not ready to give up quite yet.

Title: Nani's Gang Leader
Overview: A crime novelist is approached by a group of bereaved women to help them plot revenge against those responsible for the loss of their loved ones.

Title: Mallesham
Overview: A sixth-standard school drop-out faces many ups and downs in life when he decides to design a weaving machine to ease the plight of his mother and many like her in his village, who take up Asu work.

Title: iSmart Shankar
Overview: A contract killer goes on the run after eliminating a target and eventually finds himself linked to a slain cop whose memory is transferred to his brain.

Title: Majili
Overview: Poorna fails to appreciate the blessings in his life due to his unfulfilled dream of a cricket career and a failed romance that changes him.

Title: Jessie
Overview: Set in an abandoned house, the film follows a team of professional ghost hunters trying to conduct a paranormal investigation to unveil the mystery of two sisters, Jessie and Amy, where Amy shows unusual mental and physical behaviour.

Title: Mr. Majnu
Overview: A playboy finds himself in a spot of bother when he falls in love with the right girl.

Title: Amma Rajyam Lo Kadapa Biddalu
Overview: Amma Rajyam Lo Kadapa Biddalu (Kadapa Children in Mother's Kingdom) is a political satire film directed by Ram Gopal Varma and Siddartha Thatolu. It explores caste, dynasties, religion and their influence on politics in Andhra Pradesh, India.

Title: Venky Mama
Overview: When his sister and her husband die in a car accident, a rice-mill owner decides to raise his nephew as his own child. They become inseparable over the course of time, but there are evil forces at work that are trying to separate them.

Title: 90ML
Overview: An alcoholic who drinks 90ml of alcohol, three times a day, falls in love with a physiotherapist whose family would never approve of him and his habit.

Title: Yatra
Overview: The film focus especially on the period from 1999-2004 when YSR undertook his famous Padayatra which ultimately proved instrumental in catapulting him to a comprehensive victory in the 2004 polls.

Title: Sita
Overview: Sita is a materialistic woman who only cares about materialistic gains and nothing else. MLA Basava Raju lusts for her and wants her to give him what she promised him for helping her. The villain of their tale is Ram, a man who’s way too innocent for his own good. How does Ram help Sita out of the fix she’s in forms the crux of the story.

Title: Chanakya
Overview: Arjun aka Ramakrishna is a RAW marshall from Delhi who has a 100% success rate at nabbing terrorists. What happens when he makes enemies out of India's most wanted Ibrahim Qureshi and his son Sohail?

Title: Brochevarevarura
Overview: Three underachieving students befriend Mitra from another class. They devise a plan to help her but it leads to various problems.

Title: Voter
Overview: Gautam is an NRI who returns to India to cast his vote. When challenged by the woman he loves, Bhavana, to make a politician fulfil his campaign promises if he wants to win her over, Gautam sets off on a path to change the system.

Title: Falaknuma Das
Overview: A group of youngsters headed by Das attempt to monopolise the meat business in Falaknuma. However, they encounter some unexpected problems, which lead them to the path of crime.

Title: Manmadhudu 2
Overview: Under pressure to marry, a perennial bachelor hires a much younger woman to act as his fiancée, but her bond with his family throws his plan for a loop.

Title: Mathu Vadalara
Overview: Babu is a delivery boy living with his friends Yesu and Abhi. Due to his meagre salary, he decides to quit, but then Yesu gives him an idea. The idea, however, soon spirals out of control and Babu finds himself deep in trouble. Will he survive the circumstances of his own actions?

Title: Chitralahari
Overview: Vijay is a down-on-luck mechanical engineer who’s looking for that big break in life. Both his personal and professional lives are a mess; will he ever catch a break?

Title: Gaddalakonda Ganesh
Overview: Abhi wants to make a feature film with an antagonist as his lead and finds the perfect muse in the ruthless Gaddalakonda Ganesh. How he finally manages to make his debut forms the crux of the tale.

Title: F2: Fun and Frustration
Overview: After Venky, Varun also gets married thinking he can keep the wife in control but both of them gets frustrated with the marital life which generates fun.

Title: N.T.R: Mahanayakudu
Overview: A follow up to NTR: Kathanayakudu which was based on N.T. Rama Rao's life and acting career. This movie focuses on his political career.

Title: Dorasaani
Overview: Set in rural Telangana, A commoner dares to fall in love with a dorasaani named Devaki. Will their love survive despite the class differences?

Title: Ninu Veedani Needanu Nene
Overview: A young couple gets involved in an accident in the middle of nowhere. When they go out looking for help, they stumble across an old cemetery. They somehow reach home and things seem normal, except when they look into the mirror, they see someone else.

Title: Guna 369
Overview: Guna is a happy-go-lucky guy who believes the solution to solving issues is not through violence but through compromise.When he is framed for a crime he didn't commit by someone close to him, Guna is left with no choice and forced to the extremes to prove his innocence.

Title: Ragala 24 Gantallo
Overview: A couple fall in love and get married, but as soon as they are hitched, things begin to unravel. They discover each other's dark secrets and begin to realise that nothing is as it seems when it comes to their partners.

Title: N.T.R: Kathanayakudu
Overview: Based on the journey of the legendary Telugu actor, filmmaker and ex-Chief Minister Late Taraka Rama Rao Nandamuri.

Title: Hippi
Overview: Devadas is a kick boxer turned techie who wants to break his relationship with Amukta Malyada at any cost. But will she let it happen?

Title: Tenali Ramakrishna BA.BL
Overview: Tenali Ramakrishna is a small-time lawyer who makes his living via compromises between warring parties. He is looking for a big case that could turn his life.

Title: Rajdooth
Overview: Sanjay sets out on a mission to find the vintage bike Rajdooth as asked by his future father-in-law in order to marry the love-of-his-life Priya.

Title: Ranarangam
Overview: Deva is a powerful gangster from Visakhapatnam who moves to Spain to put his past behind him. But what happens when he realises he can’t shake off his enemies no matter where he goes?

While staying in a resort, an investigative journalist has a dream where he sees a woman being beaten to death. When he has the same dream once again in the same room of the resort, he begins to believe there might be some truth to it. He starts investigating and eventually faces physical challenges from someone who doesn't want him to uncover the truth.

Title: Raju Gari Gadhi 3
Overview: Ashwin and Maya, a couple in love, learn of the presence of an evil spirit in their life. Determined to bring their life back to normalcy, Ashwin sets out on a spooky journey to safeguard his love.

Title: Raja Vaaru Rani Gaaru
Overview: Raja, a young man, falls in love with Rani but is unable to express his feelings to her for fear of getting rejected. However, his friends decide to step in and help him woo her.

Title: Ruler
Overview: A business tycoon decides to adopt a stranger after he saves her life when someone tries to kill her. It turns out, the stranger has a murky past and while she tries everything she can to save him from it, fate brings him at crossroads with his past life.

Title: Dhrushti
Overview: A photographer's life, who is  temporarily wheelchair driven, goes into deep trouble, once he  witnesses a murder through his camera.

Title: Seven
Overview: A police officer is bewildered by conflicting statements about Karthik's identity. Several young women seem to share a mysterious connection with him. An old man claims to know Karthik as Krishnamurthy, who died thirty years ago.

Title: Iddari Lokam Okate
Overview: A series of coincidences brings two star-crossed lovers together, but fate pulls them apart until they encounter each other again in Hyderabad.

Title: Operation Gold Fish
Overview: Operation Gold Fish is an upcoming Telugu action thriller film written and directed by Sai Kiran Adivi.

Title: Kalki
Overview: A police officer gets assigned to investigate a crime scene in a town and finds out about a chain of crimes surrounding it. He begins digging deeper and finds out there’s more to it than what’s on surface.

Title: Vinara Sodara Veera Kumara
Overview: Ramana falls in love with Sulochana but their relationship fails to materialize due to which he decides to end his life. He then meets a soul that communicates with him to make him realize the importance of life over love.

Title: Kousalya Krishnamurthy
Overview: A teenage girl from a remote village in Andhra Pradesh makes her way to the Indian cricket team, but her path is not devoid of obstacles.

Title: ABCD: American-Born Confused Desi
Overview: Aravind aka Avi and his cousin Bala Shanmugam aka Basha are NRIs who love to live their life king size. What happens when the former’s father  decides to teach them a lesson in responsibility?

Title: 1st Rank Raju
Overview: Raju, an engineering student is obsessed with academics until he is thrown into the real world where he stumbles and tries to learn some very important life lessons.

Title: Tholu Bommalata
Overview: A family film directed by Viswanath Maganti, starring Harshitha Chowdary and Viswant Duddumpudi in the lead roles.

Title: Prati Roju Pandaage
Overview: Raghu Ramayya is a man with limited time to live. His children, who all live elsewhere, struggle to schedule their time around his death. But what happens when his grandson Saitakes it upon himself to give his grandfather the farewell he deserves?

Title: Special
Overview: Ranga is a mind reader who tells what is in the minds of the people by just touching them. Over the years, because of certain people, he becomes a psycho and his only motto is to kill the people who made him like this. Seeing this crazy situation, the police department appoints a special officer. Rest of the story is as to this special officer nabs Ranga and puts him behind the bars.

Title: RDX Love
Overview: Alivelu is a village belle who works as a campaigner for government welfare schemes to reach the Chief Minister of the state. How Siddu the son of a biggie, meets her and will she actually solve the long lasting problem of her village?

Title: Software Sudheer
Overview: Chandu and Swathi are Software engineers. Chandu is an average guy who never misses an opportunity to impress Swathi. Once Swathi recognizes Chandu's honesty and innocence, the affair begins. Suddenly they find themselves stuck in a major problem. Can Chandu save Swathi?

Title: Romantic Criminals
Overview: Habituated to drugs, a young couple, Karthik and Angel commit various crimes in Vizag with the help of a drug peddler. One fine day, they decide to stop all the crimes and settle down in life. Will they be able to come out of the crime world easily?

Title: Suryakantham
Overview: Abhi is all set to be engaged to Pooja, a girl he’s slowly falling for. But in walks into his life his ex-girlfriend Suryakantham like the hurricane that she is. Stuck between both, Abhi struggles to find some way to resolve the situation peacefully.

Title: Arjun Suravaram
Overview: An investigative journalist is arrested for cheating banks with fake certificates. He discovers a crime syndicate behind the scam and decides to investigate it himself.

Title: George Reddy
Overview: George Reddy is a biopic based on the life of a student leader, boxer and Gold medalist, who influenced the politics of Andhra Pradesh state in Osmania University between 1967 and 1972. He is often remembered for inspiring revolutionary thoughts until he was brutally murdered at his hostel in 1972.

Title: Mouname Ishtam
Overview: Varun is an ad filmmaker, son of alcoholic father, who lost his mother in an accident, growing up in a grandfather's upbringing. He falls for Maya, an IT employee, with a sense of helping nature & humanity. Both of them become good friends. That friendship gradually turns into love.But she has a problem to propose to Love. Why can't Varun and Maya propose love to each other?

Title: Prema Katha Chitram 2
Overview: Her unrequited love for a college mate leads a young woman to take her own life. Things take a dark turn when her spirit returns to haunt those who had caused her heartbreak.

Title: Jodi
Overview: Kapil, a system admin, detests his father for betting money on Cricket. He is such a Cricket buff that he named his son after Kapil Dev. When Kapil falls in love with a French teacher Kanchana Mala his world changes.

Title: Kathanam
Overview: Anu is a filmmaker looking for that big break in the film industry. But what happens when she realises that everyone from the script she has written keeps dying?

Title: Vishwamitra
Overview: A middle-class woman gets along with everyone as if they are her own. When she faces a big problem in her life, an unknown person comes to her rescue. Who is that unknown individual?

Title: Thipparaa Meesam
Overview: An extremely talented DJ who works at a local night club gets himself in an adventure where he must fight all odds to survive.

Title: Evadu Thakkuva Kaadu
Overview: It follows the story of four friends who face the wrath of a powerful man after their actions inadvertently result in a loss of face for him. They must now fight back against him for survival.

Title: Mis(s) Match
Overview: Maha Laxmi is an aspiring wrestler who falls in love with a techie named Siddharth. Siddarth wants to get married with the consent of both the families. But a brawl between the families turns out to be a hurdle for their marriage.

Title: Lakshmi's NTR
Overview: The life of iconic politician Nandamuri Taraka Ramarao (NTR) after meeting Lakshmi Parvathi, his second wife.

Title: Burra Katha
Overview: Abhiram  is a man born with two brains – splitting into the massy Abhi and classy Ram whenever triggered by loud noises. How he copes with it forms the crux of the story.

Title: Magnet
Overview: A romantic thriller film directed by M Adi Sesha Sai Reddy, starring Sakshi Chowdary and Posani Krishna Murali in the lead roles.

Title: Evvarikee Cheppoddu
Overview: Hari and Harathi are in love, but Harathi's father won't agree to their relationship because of their caste differences.

Title: Rahasyam
Overview: A horror thriller film directed by Sagar Shailesh, starring Sagar Shailesh and Sri Rithika in the lead roles.
